}}'''Eli Stevens''' is the son of [[Alex Karev]] and [[Izzie Stevens]].

==History==
Eli and his sister, Alexis, were conceived years before their birth while their mother was undergoing treatment for cancer. They were frozen as embryos until years later when their mother decided to use them to get pregnant. It was successful and she gave birth to twins, whom she named Eli and Alexis. Five years later, while he was calling to get a letter on Meredith's behalf from her, Alex learned about them. After the hearing, he went to Kansas to meet them. After meeting them, he decided to stay and be a family with them and Izzie.

==Relationships==
===Familial===
He lives on a farm in Kansas with his parents and his twin sister.

==Notes and Trivia==
*He was five years old when he met his father.
*Alex describes him as stubborn.
*He wants to be a doctor.
*He has a crooked smile like Alex's.
*He and his sister play a game called Sleepover, where they swap beds all night until finally landing in their parents' bed around 4 AM.
